pets.name: Cafe
pets.description: A very beautiful and loving dog who enjoys playing fetch and long walks in the park

pets.name: Luna
pets.description: Calm and affectionate cat who loves to cuddle and purr on sunny afternoons

pets.name: Coco
pets.description: Playful and intelligent cockatoo who can mimic sounds and loves social interaction

pets.name: Frijol
pets.description: Gentle guinea pig who enjoys eating fresh vegetables and exploring new spaces

pets.name: Max
pets.description: Energetic dog who loves running and playing with children in the backyard

pets.name: Mia
pets.description: Sweet kitten who is learning to use the litter box and loves chasing toys

pets.name: Rocky
pets.description: Loyal and protective dog who has been well-trained and gets along with other pets

pets.name: Bella
pets.description: Independent cat who enjoys sunbathing by the window and occasional head scratches

pets.name: Kiwi
pets.description: Colorful and talkative bird who can learn new words and loves singing in the morning

pets.name: Pepito
pets.description: Curious guinea pig who loves exploring tunnels and eating fresh carrots

pets.name: Charlie
pets.description: Friendly dog who gets excited about meeting new people and loves belly rubs

pets.name: Shadow
pets.description: Wise and calm cat who has lived a good life and enjoys quiet moments

pets.name: Rio
pets.description: Young and vibrant bird who is just learning to fly and loves fresh fruits

pets.name: Buddy
pets.description: Gentle giant dog who despite his size is very careful with small children

pets.name: Whiskers
pets.description: Tiny kitten with distinctive whiskers who loves to climb and explore high places

pets.name: Peanut
pets.description: Small but brave guinea pig who loves to popcorn jump when excited

pets.name: Sky
pets.description: Beautiful bird with stunning plumage who enjoys perching by open windows

pets.name: Duke
pets.description: Senior dog who is still playful and loves shorter walks and cozy naps
